body:
Not the "found" hypnoapp shit all over again.
Thats for old farts loli. Losers.
Not for military geek such as kensuke.
Guy sure did deserve a better plot like he built the damn thing out of Fomo 4 kaji and shinji and suzura getting harems behind his back and leaving him behind.
But no they had to go that total bogus app.
I swear it one of these days a moron who faps on that stuff is gonna come up with the real thing offline.
Then when da shit hits the fan its gonna smear all of us.
The doujinkas included.
Not usually a fan of mind control but I love how she is completely aware throughout this  and displays such displeasure. The stick scenes cracks me up everything time I read this.
Hace you seen evangelion Argus ? Asuka And reí are constantly reminded they are dolls trought they series, Thats why they are shown as dolls un the cover

I find it kind of funny that a lot cover pages of this artist's works feature a woman being recorded with a phone, but when you look at the screen, she looks like one of those tiny model figurines you'd see in an art class.
